text: China ne corona virus failaya tha
Virus China ne jaan bujh ke banaya
Muslims aur China ki sajish hai corona
Yeh sab China ka bio weapon hai
China ne duniya barbaad kar di
Ye log desh ke dushman hain
China ke log bharose ke layak nahi
Government jhooth bol rahi hai corona pe
Corona data fake hai media ka
WHO ne galat information di hai
Lockdown ka data bilkul jhootha hai
Media sab fake news faila rahi hai
Modi ji ne aaj speech di
China ke log gande hote hain
Ye community sirf violence karti hai
